items.sentence: Tom and Mary are probably not as old as everyone thinks.

I keep all my old pictures in the attic in a wooden box.
I don't think any of you realize the importance of this.
I think that dog might bite us if we get out of the car.
I won't be able to finish it unless I receive your help.
I added a picture and hope that you find it appropriate.
I can't remember when the last time I saw Tom smile was.
There's a beautiful river on the other side of the park.
Mary looked at the flowers and thought they were pretty.
Tom and Mary planned a surprise birthday party for John.
I think there's a good chance we'll never see Tom again.
We're going to try doing this a different way this time.
Do you have any idea how long Tom has been in Australia?
I heard someone following me and started walking faster.
Tom didn't like city life, so he moved back to the farm.

Tom was the only person in the library when I got there.
